invalids: I don't understand that internet slang you're using

name.message: This is Detective Burdell with GTPD. Welcome to the team, rook. You're going to be running tactical on this investigation. You got a preferred name, kid?

greetings.message: Alright, %NAME, I can't say too much on an unsecure line, but I assume you've been briefed. So whaddya think: COFFEE or TEA?

starbucks.message: I'm at Starbucks. What should I get to blend in?

outrage.message: Young people these days! I can't believe it. Good coffee is black coffee. Saw the perp leave after my outrage. Should I follow?

calm.message: Just how I like it! Just saw a man fitting our perp's description head out. Should I follow him? Could be a decoy

delicious.message: You sure know how to pick 'em %NAME! I just saw a man fitting our perp's description head out. Should I follow him? Could be a decoy

frathouse.message: He went inside a frathouse, and I don't think they've seen me. You thinking INFILTRATION or OBSERVATION? Cause I know my preference

inside.message: Never took you for a risk taker. I'll try to stick to the sidelines, but if you'd rather, I'll try to blend in
